issue.title: [Python] pyarrow.array returns NullArray for array of unsupported Python objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java
In [4]: arr = np.array([datetime.timedelta(1), datetime.timedelta(2)])

In [5]: pa.array(arr)
Out[5]: 
<pyarrow.lib.NullArray object at 0x7fbb612bba48>
[
  NA,
  NA
]
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1222?focusedCommentId=16089790) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 854
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/854>
